Hi,

    i want to display my DataGrid by Paging
 
    my datasource is a good many

    how can i do this?

Thanks,
Only

Paging isn't specific to the DataGrid.  It can really be implemented for any general ItemsControl.  Here is an example on CodeProject that does a custom paging implementation.  http://www.codeproject.com/KB/WPF/WPF_Paging.aspx
